name: KEEP-it-LIVE
description:
Story line

Farm - Cattle Farming a Major work load always, Trying to run could make all your day stud. Still Cleaning the Animals and Bathing them could be a Hazard Work Load too. Especially Piglets, Cute But Most Notorious.  Bathing them could be most worst all the time, as they love to troll in the mud all the time.
Roles:- Player Would Play the Piglet Role while the Farm Cleaner Spawns the Soap Bubbles to clean the Piglets ,Piglets need to Be Dirty to Feel Good in The Hot Summer Sun It Equips a Pointer though which a needle are ejected to Blow-Up the Bubbles.
